title: Control
fullText:
Every permanently connected low voltage appliance within a relocatable unit shall be controlled by a switch in accordance with the requirements AS/NZS 3000.
Every permanently connected low voltage appliance in a relocatable unit shall be provided with a switch that operates in all live (active and neutral) conductors.
Exception: Where an isolating transformer or electricity converter with a polarized output or a transposition sensor is installed in accordance with Clause 2.6.4 for each external supply, the switches may operate in the active conductors only.
